com.communote.server.core.tag

Class TagManagementBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.tag.TagManagementBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagManagement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TagManagementImpl

    @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRED)
public abstract class TagManagementBase
extends Object
implements TagManagement

    Spring Service base class for com.communote.server.service.tag.TagManagement, provides access to all services and entities referenced by this service.

    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
    TagManagement

    • Method Detail

      • assignGlobalIdForTag

        public void assignGlobalIdForTag(Tag tag)
        Assigns the globalId to a tag if there is not yet a suitable globalId a new one will be created. If the tag already has a globalId nothing will change.
        Specified by:
        assignGlobalIdForTag in interface TagManagement
        Parameters:
        tag - The tag.

      • createTag

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public Tag createTag(String name)
                                                        throws TagNotFoundException,
                                                               TagStoreNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: TagManagement
        Create the given tag using a new transaction, the new transacion will only be create when using this method via ServiceLocator.getTagMangement()
        Specified by:
        createTag in interface TagManagement
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        Returns:
        The created tag.
        Throws:
        TagNotFoundException - Exception.
        TagStoreNotFoundException - Exception.
        See Also:
        TagManagement.createTag(String)

      • findOrCreateTag

        public Tag findOrCreateTag(String name)
        Description copied from interface: TagManagement
        Tries to find the tag with the given name. If it does not exists it will be created using the create method using a new transaction. If this one fails, due to a already exists constraint, it will be tried to recover.
        Specified by:
        findOrCreateTag in interface TagManagement
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        Returns:
        The found or created tag.
        See Also:
        TagManagement.findOrCreateTag(String)

      • findTag

        public <T> T findTag(Long id,
                     Converter<Tag,T> converter)
        Method to find a tag and convert it to a final type.
        Specified by:
        findTag in interface TagManagement
        Type Parameters:
        T - Final type of the tag.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag.
        converter - The converter to use.
        Returns:
        Converted tag for the given id.

      • findTagByTagStoreNewTx

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public <T> T findTagByTagStoreNewTx(String tagStoreTagId,
                                                                              String tagStoreAlias,
                                                                              Converter<Tag,T> converter)
        Retrieves a tag by its TagStore definition. The operation is run in a new transaction.
        Specified by:
        findTagByTagStoreNewTx in interface TagManagement
        Type Parameters:
        T - Final type of the tag.
        Parameters:
        tagStoreTagId - the ID of the within the tag store
        tagStoreAlias - the alias of the tag store
        converter - The converter to use.
        Returns:
        Converted tag for the given id.

      • findTagNewTx

        @Transactional(readOnly=true,
               propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public Tag findTagNewTx(String name)
        Description copied from interface: TagManagement
        Find the given tag using a _new_ transaction, the new transacion will only be create then using this methode over the ServiceLocator.getTagMangement() This method should be only called internal from #findOrCreateTag!
        Specified by:
        findTagNewTx in interface TagManagement
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the tag.
        Returns:
        The found tag or null.
        See Also:
        TagManagement.findTagNewTx(String)
